name: Remove cart items test
description: Verification of the number of items into the cart
descriptionHtml: Verification of the number of items into the cart

testStage.description: Verification of the number of items into the cart

steps.name: Add items and go to Cart

parameters.name: itemNameList
parameters.value: [Sauce Labs Backpack, Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt, Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket]

parameters.name: itemNameList
parameters.value: [Sauce Labs Backpack, Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt, Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket]

steps.name: Assert equals: Verify that the shopping cart remains empty after removing items - Expected: 0 - Actual: 0
